subject: Psychology
title: Carl Rogers and Unconditional Positive Regard
description: A fast breakdown of Carl Rogers and Unconditional Positive Regard for builders.

hook.text: A therapist says: 'I accept you completely, no conditions.' The client breaks down. Nobody ever said that before.

buildup.text: Carl Rogers founded client-centered therapy, arguing that acceptance and empathy ‚Äî not analysis ‚Äî heal people.

discovery.text: Unconditional positive regard means valuing a person without conditions. It creates safety for honest self-exploration.

twist.text: Rogers rejected the expert model. The client knows themselves best. The therapist just creates the right space.

climax.text: His approach transformed therapy and influenced education, management, and parenting worldwide.

punchline.text: Acceptance without conditions is the foundation of growth.

quiz.question: What is unconditional positive regard?
options: Accepting a person completely without conditions
